trans-unit.source: The size of individual characters inside the character grid. Smaller sizes may affect performance.

trans-unit.source: Animates the character grid when resizing the window. Turning this on can incur a large performance penalty when resizing the window.

trans-unit.source: Enables subtle depth shadows on the UI. Only noticeable when using the Light theme. Turning this on may have a small performance impact on weaker devices. Requires a restart to take effect.
trans-unit.target: Enables subtle depth shadows on the UI. Only noticeable when using the Light theme. Turning this on may have a small performance impact on weaker devices. Requires a restart to take effect.

trans-unit.source: Controls most animations inside the application. Turning this off will disable most animations. Turning this on has negligible performance impact.

trans-unit.source: Choose the label to show under each character. May have a minor effect on scrolling performance.
trans-unit.target: Choose the label to show under each character. May have a minor effect on scrolling performance.

trans-unit.source: Enables transparency effects in the UI. If transparency is disabled in Windows settings, this will have no effect. May have a minor effect on performance on older or weaker devices.

trans-unit.source: Drag files from File Explorer or your desktop and drop them here to import them.
trans-unit.target: 从文件资源管理器中拖放文件到此处以导入

trans-unit.source:
You can import fonts into the application to view them without installing them in Windows.
Imported font files are copied into the app's private storage, so will still show if you delete the original file on your computer.
trans-unit.target:
你可以在不将字体安装到 Windows 的情况下导入字体到本应用。
导入的字体文件会复制到应用的私有存储中，因此即便将源字体文件删除，应用还是能显示该字体。

trans-unit.source:
Choose how to name font files when exporting them.
System will return the name of the font file Windows uses in uppercase. Optimized will create a smart name based on Font Family and Font Name.
trans-unit.target:
选择导出字体文件的时候如何命名它们。
"系统" 使用Windows所采用的字体文件的大写名称。 "优化" 根据字体家族和字体名称智能创建一个新名字。
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
